item.title: XR Summit 2024, IIT Madras - Takeaways
item.author: thinkuldeep@gmail.com (Kuldeep Singh)
item.description: I recently had the privilege of attending XR Summit 2024 at the eXperiential Technology Innovation Center (XTIC), IIT Madras.
